amendment.description: To provide for the policy of the Department of Defense on the recruitment and enlistment of home schooled individuals in the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2496 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2496 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To provide for the policy of the Department of Defense on the recruitment and enlistment of home schooled individuals in the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2496 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2496 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
